alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 22 at 3:54PM MDT until September 23 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 MPH with gusts up to 75 MPH expected. * WHERE...Much of Platte County including Chugwater, Bordeaux, Wheatland, and Glendo. This includes Interstate 25 across eastern Platte County. * WHEN...9 PM MDT this evening until 3 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County
